metadata.name: Sacred Lantern
metadata.description:
[h1] Item Info: [/h1]
• Quality: 3 • Pools: Treasure, Greed Shop, Greed Treasure, Golden Chest • Description: Remove all your broken hearts for the rest of the game, for every broken heart removed or gain during the rest of the game you obtain: Half Soul Heart and Random Stats Up • Supports EID.
